data.system_settings: iPhone 6s, iOS 11.3.1 & iPad Air 2, iOS 11.4 PB 3
data.expected_result: The code block in the message preview for these modals should NOT show the language for code blocks.
data.short_description: Language for code block for pin/delete message modal shown
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to any text channel and write a message with a code block (3 backticks) - Make sure that this code block has any language (e.g. css) after the first three backticks - Long hold the message and select either "Delete Message" or "Pin message" - Observe the message preview there
